allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Phase 21.2 - Studio Flow Advanced Features

Phase 21.2 Implementation:
- Focus Mode: Pomodoro timer \(25min\) with Start/Pause/Stop controls
- Productivity Dashboard: Charts \(matplotlib\) for task completion stats
- Calendar View: Month calendar with task indicators and .ics export
- Time tracking: focus_sessions table and time_spent columns

New files:
- ui/focus_mode.py - FocusModeWindow, QuickFocusDialog
- ui/productivity_dashboard.py - Charts and insights
- ui/calendar_view.py - Month calendar with export
- ui/tasks_view.py - 4-tab layout \(Today/Projects/Dashboard/Calendar\)
- ui/today_view.py - Daily tasks with tag selector
- ui/projects_view.py - Project management with templates
- core/task_manager.py - Full CRUD for tasks, projects, focus sessions
- tests/test_studio_flow.py - 32 automated tests \(all passing\)

Also includes:
- Inno Setup installer script \(Beatflow_installer.iss\)
- Updated requirements.txt \(matplotlib, icalendar, pytz\)
- Updated documentation \(CONTEXT.md, CURRENT_TASK.md, implementation_plan.md\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Phase 23 - Rebrand Beatflow to ProducerOS \(v1.0.0\)

BREAKING CHANGE: Application renamed from Beatflow to ProducerOS

## Brand Identity
- New name: ProducerOS \("Your Creative Command Center"\)
- Website: https://produceros.app
- Support: support@produceros.app
- Version: 1.0.0

## Code Changes

### Configuration & Data
- beatflow_config.json â†’ produceros_config.json
- beatflow.db â†’ produceros.db

### Core Layer
- core/config.py: Updated config path
- core/database.py: Updated db filename + Lab comment
- core/shell_integration.py: "Add to ProducerOS" registry keys
- core/sync.py: produceros_sync temp folder
- core/lab.py: produceros_lab temp files
- core/exporter.py: Updated docstring
- core/task_manager.py: produceros.app ICS UIDs

### UI Layer
- ui/theme.py: Updated docstring
- ui/lab_drawer.py: "PRODUCEROS LAB" title
- ui/calendar_view.py: produceros_tasks export filename
- tests/__init__.py: Updated package comment

## New Files
- core/version.py: Centralized version info \(v1.0.0\)
- BUSINESS_PLAN.md: Full commercialization strategy
- LICENSE: MIT License
- NOTICE: Third-party software attributions
- legal/EULA.txt: End User License Agreement
- legal/PRIVACY.md: Privacy Policy \(100% local, no data collection\)
- ProducerOS_installer.iss: Inno Setup script for Windows

## Deleted Files
- sample_browser.py: Legacy monolithic file \(unused\)
- Beatflow_installer.iss: Old installer script

## Documentation
- CONTEXT.md: Updated with new branding + file structure
- CURRENT_TASK.md: Rebranding summary
- implementation_plan.md: Added Phase 23

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Major UX overhaul + Remove non-essential creation tools

This commit includes two major changes coordinated by multi-agent deployment:

## Part 1: UX Improvements \(6 agents in pairs\)

### Navigation & Layout \(Pair 1\)
- Add keyboard shortcuts Ctrl+1/2/3/4 for view switching \(ui/app.py\)
- Standardize Business view tabs to CTkSegmentedButton \(ui/business_view.py\)
- Add clickable breadcrumb navigation for folder hierarchy \(ui/library.py\)
- Verify/enhance sidebar section headers \(ui/sidebar.py\)

### Interactions & Feedback \(Pair 2\)
- Add confirmation dialogs before destructive actions \(ui/tree_view.py\)
- Add loading indicator "â³ Analyzing..." for batch operations \(ui/library.py\)
- Add success feedback - save button shows "Saved!" in green \(ui/dialogs.py\)
- Add toast notifications for success messages \(ui/network_dialogs.py\)
- Add tooltip system with "[Space]" hint on play button \(ui/player.py\)

### Visual Design & Consistency \(Pair 3\)
- Add FONT_SIZES dict with 16/13/11/10px hierarchy \(ui/theme.py\)
- Add border state colors: border_default/hover/active/focus \(ui/theme.py\)
- Add SIZING constants: row_sm/md/lg, header_height=56 \(ui/theme.py\)
- Increase row_gap from 1px to 2px for breathing room \(ui/theme.py\)
- Clean spacing to pure 4px scale \(ui/theme.py\)
- Reduce sidebar_item_height from 48px to 40px \(ui/theme.py\)

## Part 2: Feature Removal \(Philosophy: Organization tool, NOT creation tool\)

### Files Deleted \(-1353 lines\)
- core/sync.py \(275 lines\) - Time-stretching/pitch-shifting engine
- core/fingerprint.py \(286 lines\) - Audio fingerprinting/sonic matching
- core/lab.py \(239 lines\) - Sample processing/editing backend
- ui/lab_drawer.py \(553 lines\) - Waveform editor UI

### Features Removed from Player \(ui/player.py\)
- Sync Engine \(BPM matching, time-stretching, pitch-shifting\)
- Metronome \(click sound, visual flash\)
- Tap Tempo button
- All sync-related state and methods

### Features Removed from Library \(ui/library.py\)
- Lab button \(ðŸ§ª\) - waveform editor access
- Sonic Match button \(âˆž\) - find similar samples
- Match results display and "Clear Match" button
- All fingerprinting-related methods

### Features Removed from Dialogs \(ui/dialogs.py\)
- Regex Renamer tab from Metadata Architect
- All regex rename methods and UI

### Database Cleanup \(core/database.py\)
- Removed fingerprints table and indexes
- Removed lab_settings table
- Removed all related methods

## Features Preserved
âœ… Waveform Seek \(click-to-seek on waveform\)
âœ… Duplicate Finder \(in Metadata Architect\)
âœ… Analyze All \(BPM/Key batch detection\)
âœ… Format Filters \(WAV/MP3/FLAC/OGG\)
âœ… Bitrate Badge display

## Stats
- Lines added: +867 \(UX improvements\)
- Lines removed: -2685 \(feature removal + cleanup\)
- Net change: -1818 lines \(leaner, focused codebase\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
